SpecularHighlights File Reference

#include <osgFX/Export>
#include <osgFX/Effect>

Classes

class  osgFX::SpecularHighlights
 This effect applies additive specular highlights at fragment level (instead of OpenGL's vertex-level lighting) by using a cube map and reflective texgen. More...

Namespaces

namespace  osgFX
 

The osgFX library is a NodeKit that extends the core scene graph to provide a special effects framework.
